page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area surveyed covers the Eastern extreme of Stanley,County Durham across to the villages of Pelton and High Handenhold. The area is basically an equal split between residential housing and farmland with no significant industrial development at all. As a result of the lack of significant development within the area this survey intends to show the general amenities,facilities,culture and leisure pursuits found within its boundaries covering topics such as housing,employment,shopping,home life,language,tourism and recreation.
